Row.Text: It's a pleasure to meet you! I am Norodom Sihanouk, Cambodia's Father Prince! Perhaps you have heard of me, or my work?

Greetings, welcome to Cambodia! My name is Sihanouk, at various times I have been the King, the Prince, the President, the Prime Minister, and the Head of State of this land. Which am I at the moment? I don't remember.
Well, that's it then. I've done my best, but as a human I'm not perfect, nobody is perfect...
